fields.description:

comments.body: Looks like BucketNotEmptyException may be missing in addition to the incorrect lookup by instance rather than by class.

I already fixed the class / instance issue in a previous commit when I stumbled across the same issue. Working right now on adding BucketNotEmptyException and a simple unit test to hopefully catch basic problems (like the class / instance thing) in the future.

This might be tricky to test, ObjectStorageGateway checks how many objects are in a bucket before sending the request to walrus. I removed the objects directly from the objectstorage database so that the objects would continue to exist in Walrus.

Not seeing this in the log anymore.
